text: Still Not Getting Any... is the second studio album by Canadian pop punk band, Simple Plan. Still Not Getting Any... was released on October 26, 2004 through both Atlantic and Lava. The album peaked at #3 on the Billboard 200 and at #2 on the Canadian Albums Chart. The album was certified Platinum by the RIAA, selling one million copies. The album featured the singles "Welcome to My Life", "Shut Up!", "Untitled (How Could This Happen to Me?)", and "Crazy". Tracklist: 01\. Shut Up! {03:03} 02\. Welcome To My Life {03:27} 03\. Perfect World {03:51} 04\. Thank You {02:54} 05\. Me Against The World {03:12} 06\. Crazy {03:37} 07\. Jump {03:08} 08\. Everytime {04:01} 09\. Promise {03:32} 10\. One {03:20} 11\. Untitled (How Could This Happen To Me?) {04:00} 12\. Don’t Wanna Think About You {03:26} 13\. Crash And Burn {03:11} 14\. Surrender {02:59} 15\. I’d Do Anything (iTunes Live From Montreal) {04:06} 16\. Welcome To My Life (Acoustic Version) {03:33} ==Songs== ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2004 albums Category:Simple Plan albums
title: Still Not Getting Any...
